1. wsi_otsu.py
- python wsi_otsu.py -ir=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/training/* -ar \
/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/training/lesion_annotations -sf /root/workspace/dataset/prepare_data/16/wsi_otsu_save\
 -ds 64 -si 0
- python wsi_otsu.py -ir=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/testing/images -ar /root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/testing/lesion_annotations -sf ./wsi_otsu_save/testing -si 0

2. wsi_coord_generate.py
- python wsi_coord_generate.py -ir=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/training/*/ -ar=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/training/lesion_annotations -mr=./wsi_otsu_save/training/ -sf=./wsi_coord_generate_save/training -si 0 
2.2 wsi_test_coord_generate
- python wsi_test_coord_generate.py -ir=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/testing/images -ar=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/testing/lesion_annotations -mr=./wsi_otsu_save/testing/ -sf=./wsi_coord_generate_save/testing/txt_new -si 0 

3. wsi_generate_patch.py
- python wsi_generate_patch.py -tr=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/code/wsi_coord_generate_save/training/txt -pr=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/code/wsi_patches/training -tf=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/training/*
3.1 wsi_test_generate_patch.py
- python wsi_test_generate_patch.py -tr=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/code/wsi_coord_generate_save/testing/txt -pr=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/code/wsi_patches/test/folder -tf=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/testing/images -si=80 -ei=100
- python wsi_test_generate_patch.py -tr=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/code/wsi_coord_generate_save/testing/txt_new -pr=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/code/wsi_patches/test/folder_new -tf=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/testing/images -si=80 -ei=100

4. wsi_mask
- python wsi_mask.py -ir=/root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/training/* -ar /root/workspace/dataset/CAMELYON16/training/lesion_annotations -sf /root/workspace/dataset/prepare_data/16/wsi_otsu_save -ds 64 -si 0
